properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '클래스' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT NOTICE_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , NCOUNT , NOTICE_STATUS , NOTICE_DATE , USER_NAME , MODIFY_DATE , C_PRICE , FILE_NUM , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , ROUTE , FILE_LEVEL , F.STATUS FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER_INFO USING(USER_ID) JOIN CLASS USING(NOTICE_NUM) JOIN "FILE" F USING(NOTICE_NUM) WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = '클래스' AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_NUM DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET NCOUNT = NCOUNT+1 WHERE NOTICE_NUM = ?

SELECT NOTICE_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_NAME , C_WRITER , C_CATEGORY , C_PRICE , NOTICE_CONTENT , C_TAG1 , C_TAG2 , C_SDATE , C_TIME1 , C_TIME2 , C_LOCATION , C_TUTOR , NOTICE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , NOTICE_STATUS FROM CLASS JOIN NOTICE USING(NOTICE_NUM) JOIN MEMBER_INFO M ON (M.USER_ID = C_WRITER) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'N' AND NOTICE_NUM = ?
SELECT FILE_NUM , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , ROUTE , FILE_LEVEL FROM "FILE" WHERE NOTICE_NUM = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FILE_NUM

INSERT INTO NOTICE( NOTICE_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_DATE , NOTICE_STATUS , NOTICE_TYPE , USER_ID , MODIFY_DATE , NCOUNT ) VALUES( SEQ_NOTICE_NUM.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? , ? , SYSDATE , DEFAULT )

INSERT INTO CLASS ( NOTICE_NUM , C_TAG1 , C_TAG2 , C_PRICE , C_CATEGOFY , C_SDATE , C_LOCATION , C_TUTOR , C_WRITER , C_TIME1 , C_TIME2 ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NUM.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO "FILE" ( FILE_NUM , NOTICE_NUM , ROUTE , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_LEVEL , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE_NUM.NEXTVAL , SEQ_NOTICE_NUM.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT )
